name: Visible Thoughts: 004
description:
004 of the Visible Thoughts series.

My favourite part about writing is how freeform it is; it can be anything you want it to be. It can bend and merge and even snap to fit where you want it to and it will freely give way to your control. But the best part is what it produces each time. Like reaching up and plucking a single raindrop from a cloud, if you hold it to the sun it will glimmer and shine with brilliant colour. Writing is like that, but with your mind. All our minds contain that same brilliance - you just have to reach in and take it.
